One third patient receive collagen matrix ( CM group ) , another third receive connective tissue graft remove palate ( CTG group ) final third receive soft tissue graft ( CTL group ) .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Soft Tissue Grafts Tissue Alterations After Immediate Tooth Replacement
DOC.detailed_description: Preventing soft tissue recession follow flapless immediate implant provisional placement ( IIPP ) sockets facial bone dehiscence challenge , mainly esthetic area . This study evaluate impact soft tissue graft peri-implant alteration 1-year follow-up . Twenty-four patient one single fail maxillary incisor present facial bone dehiscence receive IIPP randomly divide three group ( n= 8 group ) : Control ( CTL ) ; Collagen Matrix ( CM ) ; Connective tissue graft ( CTG ) . In addition soft tissue graft , group treat collagen membrane deproteinized bovine bone mineral contain 10 % porcine collagen . Clinical , photographic tomographic analysis perform baseline , 6 12 month surgery evaluate tissue alteration .
